titles.title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to deny the foreign tax credit and deduction for taxes paid in lieu of income taxes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.
Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR H1745)

bill.summary: 3/16/1993--Introduced. Amends the Internal Revenue Code to repeal the foreign tax credit and the deduction for taxes in lieu of income, war profits, or excess profits taxes imposed by a foreign country or U.S. possession.
